SETVAR.NAME: sqlsys
SETVAR.VALUE: SELECT tblname FROM SystemInfo WHERE tblname NOT IN (Variables.doneTables) AND systable='yes' ORDER BY LOWER(tblname) ASC

SETVAR.NAME: sqlassettype
SETVAR.VALUE: SELECT assettype as tblname FROM AssetType WHERE assettype NOT IN (SELECT assettypename FROM ComplexAssets) ORDER BY LOWER(assettype) ASC

SETVAR.NAME: sqlcomplex
SETVAR.VALUE: select assettypename as tblname from ComplexAssets where assettypename NOT IN (select assettype from FlexAssetTypes) AND assettypename NOT IN (select distinct assetattr from FlexAssetTypes) AND assettypename NOT IN (select filtertype from FlexFilterTypes) AND assettypename NOT IN (select assettype from FlexGroupTypes) AND assettypename NOT IN (select assettype from FlexGrpTmplTypes) AND assettypename NOT IN (select assettype from FlexTmplTypes) and assettypename NOT IN ('AdvCols', 'HFields', 'HistoryVals', 'Promotions', 'ScalarVals', 'Segments') ORDER BY LOWER(assettypename) ASC

SETVAR.NAME: sqlflexmaster
SETVAR.VALUE: SELECT tblname FROM SystemInfo where systable!='yes' and tblname LIKE ('Flex%') ORDER BY LOWER(tblname) ASC

SETVAR.NAME: sqlattributes
SETVAR.VALUE: SELECT DISTINCT assetattr as tblname FROM FlexGroupTypes ORDER BY assetattr ASC

SETVAR.NAME: sqlflexgroup
SETVAR.VALUE: SELECT assettype as tblname FROM FlexGroupTypes ORDER BY LOWER(assettype) ASC

SETVAR.NAME: sqlflexassets
SETVAR.VALUE: SELECT assettype as tblname FROM FlexAssetTypes ORDER BY LOWER(assettype) ASC

SETVAR.NAME: sqlflexgrouptempl
SETVAR.VALUE: SELECT assettype as tblname FROM FlexGrpTmplTypes ORDER BY LOWER(assettype) ASC

SETVAR.NAME: sqlflextempl
SETVAR.VALUE: SELECT assettype as tblname FROM FlexTmplTypes ORDER BY LOWER(assettype) ASC

SETVAR.NAME: sqlflexfilter
SETVAR.VALUE: SELECT filtertype as tblname FROM FlexFilterTypes ORDER BY LOWER(filtertype) ASC

SETVAR.NAME: sqlworkflow
SETVAR.VALUE: SELECT tblname FROM SystemInfo WHERE systable!='yes' AND tblname IN ('Assignment','DefWorkflowRoles','FunctionPrivs','GroupParticipants','Workflow','StartParticipantChoice','StartProcessChoice') ORDER BY LOWER(tblname) ASC

SETVAR.NAME: sqlpublish
SETVAR.VALUE: SELECT tblname FROM SystemInfo WHERE systable!='yes' AND tblname IN ('ApprovedAssets','ApprovedAssetDeps','ApprovalQueue', 'AssetPublishList','AssetExportData','AssetDefaultTemplate','DeliveryType','PublishedAssets','PubTarget','PubContext','PubKeyTable','PubSession','PubMessage') ORDER BY LOWER(tblname) ASC

SETVAR.NAME: sqltree
SETVAR.VALUE: SELECT tblname FROM SystemInfo where systable!='yes' and tblname LIKE ('TreeTabs') ORDER BY LOWER(tblname) ASC

SETVAR.NAME: sqlsmenu
SETVAR.VALUE: SELECT tblname FROM SystemInfo where systable!='yes' and tblname LIKE ('StartMenu') ORDER BY LOWER(tblname) ASC

SETVAR.NAME: sqlsearch
SETVAR.VALUE: SELECT tblname FROM SystemInfo where systable!='yes' and tblname LIKE ('SaveSearch') ORDER BY LOWER(tblname) ASC

SETVAR.NAME: sqlengage
SETVAR.VALUE: SELECT tblname FROM SystemInfo where systable!='yes' and tblname IN ('AdvCols', 'CARTSET', 'Comparators', 'ObjectRegistry', 'Promotions', 'ScalarVals', 'Segments', 'recpromo', 'RuleMap', 'RuleSetDef', 'scratch') ORDER BY LOWER(tblname) ASC

SETVAR.NAME: sqlvdmt
SETVAR.VALUE: SELECT tblname FROM SystemInfo WHERE systable!='yes' and tblname LIKE ('VM%') OR tblname IN ( 'HFields', 'HistoryVals' ) ORDER BY LOWER(tblname) ASC

SETVAR.NAME: sqlframework
SETVAR.VALUE: SELECT tblname FROM SystemInfo WHERE systable!='yes' and tblname IN ('ActiveList', 'adminformimages', 'AssetPublication', 'AssetRelationTree', 'AssetStubElementCatalog', 'AssetSubtypes', 'AssetType', 'AssocNamed', 'AssocNamed_Subtypes', 'Category', 'CCFunction', 'CCRoles', 'CheckOutInfo', 'clickstream', 'CSEvents', 'ComplexAssets', 'DistributionList', 'EmbeddedReference', 'ObjectPrivs', 'ObjectPublish', 'Previewgen', 'Publication_Replicate', 'Replicate', 'Replicate_Assets', 'Replicate_AssetTypes', 'searchpref', 'TempBlobs', 'TNames', 'UnassignedObjects', 'externalclients', 'externalclientsconfig', 'Filters', 'LocaleMap', 'MenuArgs', 'MenuLegalArgs', 'MimeType', 'MungoBlobs', 'Publication', 'PublicationTree', 'SitePlanTree', 'Source', 'StatusCode', 'TempObjects', 'UserPublication') AND systable NOT IN ('tmp','fgn') ORDER BY LOWER(tblname) ASC

SETVAR.NAME: sqlmisc
SETVAR.VALUE: SELECT tblname FROM SystemInfo WHERE systable!='yes' and tblname NOT IN (Variables.doneTables) ORDER BY LOWER(tblname) ASC
